ResourceHeader.Description: The FM-3I instrument consists of two fluxgate magnetometers covering two different ranges: -200 to +200 nT and -1000 to +1000 nT. Besides scientific goals, the FM-3I experiment data is used to perform the attitude control of the spacecraft.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog
InformationURL.Description: Information about the Fluxgate DC Magnetometer FM-3I experiment on the Interball Tail Probe mission.

Instrument.InvestigationName: Fluxgate DC Magnetometer FM-3I on Interball Tail Probe
